UserTexts.txt_passwords_do_not_match: Kāore ngā kupuhipa i ōrite. Tēnā whakamātau anō.
UserTexts.txt_password_invalid: Me 8 ngā pūāhua, me whai pūāhua tau, pūāhua motuhake, kāore he pūāhua tāruarua.
UserTexts.txt_registration_success: Kua angitū te rēhitatanga! Tēnā takiuru.
UserTexts.txt_username_exists: Kua noho kē te ingoa kaiwhakamahi. Tēnā whakamātau anō.
UserTexts.txt_password_change_failed: Kupuhipa o nāianei hē. Kāore i panoni te kupuhipa.
UserTexts.txt_invalid_admin_credentials: Kāore i te tika ngā mōhiohio kaiwhakahaere.
UserTexts.txt_invalid_customer_credentials: Kāore i te tika ngā mōhiohio kiritaki.
UserTexts.txt_are_you_admin_or_customer: He Kaiwhakahaere koe, he Kiritaki rānei?
UserTexts.txt_new_or_existing_customer: He kiritaki hou koe, he kiritaki mema rānei?
UserTexts.txt_invalid_email: Hōputu īmēra hē. Tēnā whakamātau anō.

CarTexts.enter_min_rent: Tāuruhia te wā rīhi iti rawa (ngā rā):
CarTexts.enter_max_rent: Tāuruhia te wā rīhi nui rawa (ngā rā):
CarTexts.invalid_type: Kāore i te tika te momo waka!
CarTexts.add_fail: I rahua te tāpiri waka. Tēnā whakamātau anō.
CarTexts.enter_update_id: Tāuruhia te ID waka hei whakahou:
CarTexts.new_values: Tāuruhia ngā uara hou (waiho kia noho mō te uara o nāianei):
CarTexts.update_fail: I rahua te whakahou waka. Tēnā whakamātau anō.
CarTexts.enter_delete_id: Tāuruhia te ID waka hei muku:
CarTexts.confirm_delete: Kei te hiahia muku i te waka {id}? (āe/kāo):
CarTexts.delete_fail: I rahua te muku waka. Tēnā whakamātau anō.

RentalTexts.pending_requests: Ngā Tono Rīhi e Tatari ana:
RentalTexts.no_pending: Kāore he rīhi e tatari ana.
RentalTexts.rental_id_prompt: Tāuruhia te ID Rīhi hei whakaae/whakakāhoretia (pāwhiri Enter hei hoki):
RentalTexts.cars_for_dates: Ngā Waka mō ngā Rā i Kōwhiria:
RentalTexts.no_cars_available: Kāore he waka wātea mō ngā rā i kōwhiria.
RentalTexts.car_id_prompt: Tāuruhia te ID Waka hei rīhi (WĀTEA ANAKE):
RentalTexts.not_available: Kāore te waka i te wātea mō te rīhi.
RentalTexts.booked_success: Kua rēhitatia te rīhi! E tatari ana mō te whakaaetanga.
RentalTexts.booking_id_cancel: Tāuruhia te ID Rīhi hei whakakore:
RentalTexts.cancel_fail: I rahua te whakakore rīhi, kāore rānei i kitea.
RentalTexts.booking_id_update: Tāuruhia te ID Rīhi hei whakahou:
RentalTexts.new_car_id: Tāuruhia te ID Waka hou (pāwhiri Enter hei pupuri i te uara o nāianei):
RentalTexts.update_fail: I rahua te whakahou rīhi. Ka taea anake ngā rīhi e tatari ana te whakahou.
RentalTexts.start_date_invalid: Me tīmata te rā i tēnei rā, ā muri ake rānei.
RentalTexts.end_date_invalid: Me mutu te rā i te wāheke, kāore i mua i te rā tīmata.

EmailTexts.approval_body:
E te Kiritaki,

Kua whakaaetia tō rīhi mō te {car_make} {car_model} mai i te {start_date} ki te {end_date}. Utu katoa: ${amount}.

Ngā mihi mō tō kōwhiringa i Philip Rent-A-Car!
EmailTexts.rejection_body:
E te Kiritaki,

Aroha mai, kāore i whakaaetia tō tono rīhi mō te {car_make} {car_model} mai i te {start_date} ki te {end_date}.

Tēnā whakapā mai mō ētahi atu pārongo.
